client_id.title: ClientID
client_id.description: Your Plaid API `client_id`. The `client_id` is required and may be provided either in the `PLAID-CLIENT-ID` header or as part of a request body.

secret.title: APISecret
secret.description: Your Plaid API `secret`. The `secret` is required and may be provided either in the `PLAID-SECRET` header or as part of a request body.

report_tokens.description: List of report token strings, with at most one token of each report type. Currently only Asset Report token is supported.

items.description: The report token. It can only be an asset report token token.

secondary_client_id.description: The `secondary_client_id` is the client id of the third party with whom you would like to share the relay token.

webhook.description: URL to which Plaid will send webhooks when the Secondary Client successfully retrieves an Asset Report by calling `/credit/relay/get`.
